message:
Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur presents Open IIT bengali elocution. Venue: F116, Main Building 6pm onwards. 

Register at: https://goo.gl/forms/04JsqieP4c7PJoLz1

Rules : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zf8SS4RvDzLeJd59tYJfY_LgPpSqL6jnyU0f7FVk-CE/edit?usp=sharing
Note : The time for elocution is 4 minutes(3+1)

The English Academy of St. Xavier's College, Kolkata presents their annual lit-fest Literaria 2016. The following are online events : 
1. Meme'sis (the meme making competition)
2. Striptacular (comic-strip creations)
3. Doodlebug (the doodle competition for the free-flowing, felt-tip pen happy)
4. Lens and Lensibility (the photography competition, but we appreciate Austen too)
5. Dress the Digest (calling all graphics geeks to show off their magazine designs)
6. Jump Cut (a film making project and competition for all the cinephiles out there)

So, sign up for the event which you feel is the perfect fit by shooting an email (with your name, department and college, and the event you want to participate  in) at literaria16@gmail.com
Registrations: 17th August to 5th September.

Get literary, literally.

Open IIT Product Design:
Presentation Date: 6th September, 6:30 pm onwards

The judging criteria and other details will be conveyed to General Secretaries Technology of Halls of Residence by Tuesday(30/8/16). In case of any query, contact them.

Teams must register by 2nd September, 6 pm on:
http://bit.ly/2bINAeY

Any registration beyond this won't be accepted!

story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur's photo.
message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Foreign Training and Research Talk presented to you by the International Relations Cell, IIT Kharagpur for all those aspirants who dream to work abroad in a University on a Project next Summer, this is something you surely aren't missing. We have invited students from the 3rd and 4th Year who interned in various Prestigious Universities to share their experiences and valuable insights about the Foreign Training Process, also to calm your jitters and shackle the myths if any. Sunday, 28th August, 5pm at V4...Be there!! :)

message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Technology Robotix Society's photo. Technology Robotix Society Welcomes you all to participate in Freshers' RoboSoccer Challenge. #GearUp for an action packed weekend when your bots take on one another. Register yourself at - www.tinyurl.com/robsoc16

story: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo.
message: Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur shared Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur's photo. Ahoy Freshers! The time has come to witness the grandeur of yet another facet of the technosapien cosmos. So, hop on, sit back and construe as we delve deeper into this exhilarating spirit of Asia's largest techno-management fest. Be there at Kalidas Auditorium on 25th August (Thursday) at 8 PM. Surprises await you!
